title: Automating haveibeenpwned Breach Searches with Powershell
tags: BlueOps, detection, automation, powershell, haveibeenpwned, trello, daemon, api
snippet: IntroductionIn an effort to automate as much as possible for my organization, I created two Powershell modules to help out our team with various tasks. This use case is the automation of checking haveibeenpwned (HIBP) daily and confirming if any of our enterprise users were found in a breach. The...
